alert.note: Alert for Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra; Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 21 at 11:29PM PST until January 23 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM PST EARLY TUESDAY MORNING ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet above 10000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches from 7000 feet to 10000 feet. * WHERE...The Sierra Nevada above 7000 feet. * WHEN...Until 1 AM PST Tuesday early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to nearly impossible. Avoid travel if possible.
info.instruction: If you plan to travel, consider alternate strategies. If you must travel, remember to carry tire chains, plenty of food, a good deal of water, warm clothing, and a flashlight in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
